description: Relevance dataset for IR metrics evaluation
instructions: 1. For each query, retrieve products using the system
2. Manually label each product with relevance score (0-4)
3. Update the 'relevant_products' dict with product_id: relevance_score
4. Save the file and run evaluation/evaluate_ir_metrics.py

retrieved_products.name: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones

retrieved_products.description: Wireless Charging Pad Fast wireless charging pad compatible with all Qi-enabled devices. Sleek design with LED indicator. Charges phones, earbuds, and smartwatches. Category: electronics
